data.title: Roc Nation Sports
data.text:
SOURCE SPORTS: JAY-Z Gets Early Look at the New Arena Home of the Los Angeles Clippers

JAY-Z got an advanced look at the Los Angeles Clippers’ new home. The new arena is a project led by fellow billionaire and Clippers owner Steve Ballmer. Hov strolled the new building, which cost a whopping $1.2 billion to make. View this post on Instagram A post shared by 2Cool2Blog (@2cool2bl0g) Visit streaming.thesource.com for more […]

SOURCE SPORTS: JAY-Z Supports Roc Nation Sports’ Vinicius Jr. at Champions League Final

Roc Nation founder JAY-Z arrived pitchside at Wembley Stadium on Saturday, June 1, to support Roc Nation Sports International client Vinicius Jr. during the Champions League Final in London. Vinicius Jr. played a pivotal role in sealing the trophy for Real Madrid with a massive goal, marking the Brazilian star’s second Champions League win. Visit […]

SOURCE SPORTS: Roc Nation Sports International Launches ‘RNSI Productions’

Roc Nation Sports International is making strides in the content creation and video production space with the launch of RNSI Productions. This new venture aims to enhance storytelling capabilities for clients and partners worldwide, solidifying Roc Nation Sports International’s position as industry leaders in agency content creation. Visit streaming.thesource.com for more information RNSI Productions, led […]

SOURCE SPORTS: Roc Nation Sports International (RNSI) Expands into Brazil, Signs Soccer Superstar Vinicius Jr.

Roc Nation Sports International (RNSI) is making a significant move into the South American football market with the launch of Roc Nation Sports Brazil. This expansion is made possible by acquiring TFM Agency, a prestigious Brazilian football agency based in São Paulo. Visit streaming.thesource.com for more information TFM Agency currently represents over 100 footballers, including […]

SOURCE SPORTS: Roc Nation Sports Partners with Ryder Cup to Reach New Audiences, DJ Khaled Named Ambassador

Roc Nation Sports International (RNSI) has announced an unprecedented consultancy partnership with the illustrious Ryder Cup. This groundbreaking collaboration aims to leverage Roc Nation’s extensive influence to introduce the intense drama and excitement of golf’s premier team competition to new audiences, building anticipation for the 44th edition of the Ryder Cup set to take place […]

SOURCE SPORTS: Roc Nation Sports International Renews Partnership with Kevin De Bruyne’s KDB Cup

Roc Nation Sports International has renewed its partnership and support of the Kevin De Bryne Cup and will be a primary sponsor for both the 2020 and 2021 tournaments. Visit streaming.thesource.com for more information The 2020 games are set for May 30-31 in Ghent, Belgium and will be a two-day tournament that will bring U15 […]

SOURCE SPORTS: Roc Nation Sports Announces the Signing of Dennis Smith Jr.

On the day that the 2019-2020 NBA season is set to kick-off, Roc Nation Sports has announced the signing of New York Knicks guard Dennis Smith Jr. Visit streaming.thesource.com for more information The starting point guard will be entering his third season in the NBA, his first complete season as a member of the Knicks. […]

Jay Z Reportedly Tried To Make Kevin Durant Meet With The Knicks And Nets

Jay Z has quite a bit of influence when it comes to business. His Roc Nation empire represents some of the world’s most successful musical acts, athletes and personalities. Even with all of his influence and power, there are certain limitations. It is being reported that Hov recently tried to talk his Roc Nation Sports […]

TMZ Cameraman Bets Roc Nation Sports Client Todd Gurley He Can’t Name 3 Jay Z Albums

Visit streaming.thesource.com for more information NFL Offensive Rookie of the Year and Pro Bowl running back Todd Gurley is just 21 years old, so a TMZ cameraman thought he might not be as well-versed on his boss Jay Z‘s discography as most. He was wrong and it cost him $100. The pap caught up with Todd […]

JAY Z Shows Up In St. Louis Rams Locker Room To Congratulate Roc Nation’s Todd Gurley On Big Game

Though they are technically still alive in the NFC wildcard race, the 5-8 St. Louis Rams hopes of the post season are all but finished. The team took on the also reeling Detroit Lions at home Sunday (December 13) and capped things off with a 21-14 victory, stopping a 5-game losing skid for the Rams. […]

Jay-Z & Oscar De La Hoya Bet $100K On Miguel Cotto Vs. Canelo Alvarez Boxing Match

Miguel Cotto will be fighting Canelo Alvarez next week in Vegas, and it’s in Jay-Z’s best interest if Cotto ends the match victoriously. Visit streaming.thesource.com for more information Not only is Cotto Jay-Z’s Roc Nation Sports client, but Jay-Z put up a whopping $100,000 against Oscar De La Hoya that says Cotto will win. If […]

Jay-Z Signs a Superstar to Roc Nation Sports

Jay-Z was able to add a big player to his Roc Nation Sports division. Soccer star Jerome Boateng of Bayern Munich just agreed to terms to join Roc Nation Sports. This is beneficial for both Roc Nation and Boateng. The 26-year-old star defender is the first European athlete to sign with Roc Nation, and according to TMZ, told a […]

NBA Bound And Former UK Wildcat Willie Cauley-Stein Signs With Roc Nation Sports

Willie Cauley-Stein Joins his former teammate at Roc Nation Sports

Roc Nation Gets Into Film/TV Management

Since its inception, Roc Nation has been taking over the world step by step, and they just unveiled another power move.

Florida Panthers CEO Resigns And Plans To Join Roc Nation Sports

Looks like Roc Nation Sports is adding some talent to the front office

Ndamukong Suh May Be Signing To Jay Z’s Roc Nation Sports Very Soon

Visit streaming.thesource.com for more information This sounds like fun. Ndamukong Suh has been in the headlines for all the right and wrong reasons in his relatively short NFL career.
